caption.p: Distribution of TX (°C), TN (°C) and PR (%) anomalies (future–historical) for the most relevant predictors (TX11, TX03, TX04 and TX05; TN04 and TN05; PR01, PR04, PR05 and PR06) for cluster 1 (top) and cluster 2 (bottom). Each boxplot represents the combined distribution of the CORDEX available models for the: (yellow) RCP4.5 2042–2070; (orange) RCP8.5 2042–2070.
